data.title: Philadelphia Overdose Memorial — Substance Use Philly
data.meta_description: Grieving a substance use related loss of a loved one? Submit their photo and a tribute message or description to our virtual drug overdose memorial.
data.text:
Beckee Carannante

Loosing you was the biggest shock of my life. Ill forever miss you. Love always your twin

John Mosemann

John Mosemann earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from the Pennsylvania College of Performing Arts in Philadelphia, PA in 1984. He played drums in Jazz groups throughout the Philadelphia and Lancaster area. John was known by his peers as an accomplished and talented musician.

Devon Decker

My son Devon Decker lost his life due to Fentanyl poisoning, and it was very unexpected. He was a wonderful young man and was very protective over his family as well as loyal to his friends.

Tyreek Lewis

Tyreek is truly missed and loved by many. As his mother, I will continue to keep his memory alive. Rest well my sweet Angel

Samuel James Howard

Sam was brilliant, kind and funny. He was a joy to be around and a privilege to know.

Tom Reynolds

Gina Vicent

My beautiful daughter Gina I miss you every second of every day I love you always and forever

Gordon Joseph Holbrook /

Jennifer McHugh /

Courtney Marie Dalby /

Jerminda Cox /

Gordon Joseph Holbrook / Jennifer McHugh / Courtney Marie Dalby / Jerminda Cox / Gordon Joseph Holbrook / Jennifer McHugh / Courtney Marie Dalby / Jerminda Cox /

Marco Martin Giasullo

Marco Martin Giasullo, my older brother, was a star athlete and an intelligent, smart, funny individual who made everyone laugh.

Angela

On July 10, 2021, a light was dimmed in this world. The world got a little darker and Heaven got a little brighter.

Brian Charles Dougherty

Brian Charles Dougherty, 39 years old; Sunrise: October 19, 1980, Sunset: September 29, 2020; Son, Brother, Grandson, Father and Grandfather, Friend. Our hearts ache so much and wish we could have him here.

James McComb

James McComb was a smart, personable old soul with a heart for people down on their luck. He was the father of 4 boys whom he loved dearly.

Christopher Cruz /

Sean Fisher /

Atanosio Vincenzo Formosa /

Shawn C. Williams /

Christopher Cruz / Sean Fisher / Atanosio Vincenzo Formosa / Shawn C. Williams / Christopher Cruz / Sean Fisher / Atanosio Vincenzo Formosa / Shawn C. Williams /

Joseph Sardella

Joseph Michael Sardella, age 24, of Havertown lost his courageous and fierce battle with addiction on August 31, 2019.

Sean McComb

Sean McComb had a heart of gold, a smile that made you smile & always rooted for the underdog. He was the father of 1 son & 3 daughters. His legacy will be as varied as his children.

Stosh

Stosh was loved by all, especially by me, his mom. He was a devoted family man who always answered his kids' phone calls. The last call he didn't answer. I'll love you forever, Mom

Morgan John Bazik

Morgan John Bazik was my world and I was his. He dies at 20 years old due to a friend giving him pure fentanyl after being clean 3.5 months.

Shawn

Shawn was a loving, kind gentle soul who loved deeply. His addiction started due to trauma he endured in his younger years. I share his story often and have placed a memorial garden in his honor dedicated to all who lost, those who struggle and to show those in recovery they matter regardless of what they have done during active use. The Circle of Hope project in Tuckahoe park. Altoona Pa.

Joshua Legassey

"Joshua Legassey was a son, brother (older and younger), an uncle, a godfather, and a best friend. He was fiercely protective of his little sister. He was a hard worker starting his first paying job at the age of 14. Joshua was a percussion player but favored the drums. Joshua loved to ride trick bikes. He was smarter then most his age and if something broke he could fix it. He was going to become an engineer and design baseball stadiums. Joshua could light up any room he entered as he was the true king of corny jokes. Joshua was ours and he is loved.

Jimmy

After a decade long battle with substance use disorder, Jimmy died from an accidental overdose while staying in a recovery home in Bristol, Bucks County. Jimmy was kind and funny. He loved his friends and family so much. He had an extra special bond with his little brother Justin. Jimmy loved animals, especially cats. He had a definite soft spot for his cats Bat and Nova. He loved all Philly sports teams, a die hard bleed green Eagles fan. One of his favorite memories was attending the Eagles Super Bowl Victory parade with his dad and friends. We miss him so very much, every hour of every day.

Austin Joseph Murphy-Legassey

Austin Joseph Murphy-Legassey was the third born of six children. He was an avid rock climber as a teen. He loved taking on any adventure or challenge. He had the most giving nature. He was a gentle soul who loved with his whole heart. He would go above to make another happy. He was loyal to those he loved. He was a video blogger. He was a momma's boy who loved his momma without fault. He was the best uncle and his nephew's best friend. He made the best sweet tea in the eyes of his nephew. Everyone is somebody's someone Austin was ours. Austin is missed and he is loved.

Jada Parker /

Reggie Phillips /

Marie Berg /

Andrew Stephen Licciardello Junior /

My Beautiful Boy 5/2/83 - 8/28/19

Jada Parker / Reggie Phillips / Marie Berg / Andrew Stephen Licciardello Junior / My Beautiful Boy 5/2/83 - 8/28/19 Jada Parker / Reggie Phillips / Marie Berg / Andrew Stephen Licciardello Junior / My Beautiful Boy 5/2/83 - 8/28/19

Anaya Rivers

A sister is someone who loves you from the heart,

No matter how much you argue you cannot be drawn apart.

She is a joy that cannot be taken away,

Once she enters your life, she is there to stay.

Francis Patrick Rooney

This is my Father, the most giving and loving soul. No matter what challenging obstacles he faced in life, he remained with the biggest heart. My protector, my first love, my motivation, my father. He is missed every single day. Until we meet again.

Love, Kaela.

Andrew Baschoff

I miss you Drew by Ellie LeJeune:

My handsome Trans son,

home to heaven where rainbows

Have always been created.

Curtis Case

This is my older brother Curtis Case he was the sweetest caring and loving person and loved by all friends and family he will be dearly missed so much 😔 i love you rest in peace ❤️. With love always, your baby sister Latreish C

Bree Logue

Bree loved to cook, dance and sing. She had a beautiful voice and sounded like an angel. She wanted to open her own restaurant some day and planned to call it Packy's Place. Bree also loved butterflies and to snuggle up watching Netflix. She was an amazing aunt to her two precious nieces. She also had a contagious laugh that would have everyone in the room laughing along with her. Bree's hope and dreams were shattered when she passed away from acute fentanyl toxicity. She is missed dearly by her family and friends.

Matthew Hankinson

Matty or Hank as his friends called him was a charming, creative musical soul who loved deeply and struggled hard. He is so dearly missed by his ""Ma"", Dad, sister, Mommom and close friends as well as his brotherhood in recovery. His death is senseless and too soon. The epidemic must be halted. We will never stop fighting. #forever26

Love you baby boy, Matt's Ma

Steven Michael Miller

Steve was freed from the powers of his addiction on November 24, 2020. He was an amazing man who walked through life with a smile always on his face. He is and always will be missed and loved by so many family and friends. Love you always Steven and forever in our hearts - Mom, Dad, Amy and Megan.

Ava Michelle Howland

Ava Michelle Howland, my beautiful Daughter loved life. She was a free-spirited, artistic, creative an had an awesome sense of humor. She helped others before helping herself. She was very protective over those she loved and stood up for them without hesitation. She is missed very much by all who loved her. She will always be my Sunshine. Mommy Loves You! ❤️

Michael A Lang

Michael you bought a smile to everyone you seen. You were kind & generous to all. You are truly missed & loved by so many. We love & miss you to the stars & back Mom & Dad. SPadly missed by Lynn & Michael Lang

Damien Nicholas DeRose

For my precious child, my son, my brilliant star, my compass, my smiling, singing, sunlit darling boy, my hero; my heart and soul ache for just the sight of you. I will find you and love you eternally, Mom.

Christopher C. Tubbs

Christopher Tubbs, a son, a brother, a friend and much more. Christopher was a caring and empathetic young man who care about people. He impacted the lives of others young and old with his infectious laugh and smile. RIP with love.

Mom and Tahyetta

Giana Natali

Giana Natali was a loving daughter, sister, aunt, niece, cousin, and friend. As a veterinary nurse she demonstrated her love for animals. Her family honors her life and loves and misses her every day. 1/21/80-1/3/14

Scott M. Hogan

My brother Scott was the most caring, loving, sarcastic, smart big brother anyone could ask for. He was an uncle, son and brother. Smarter then anyone I knew. He could light up room! He is missed so much.

Ned Felici Jr.

Ned Felici Jr. was a loving son, amazing brother, proud father and was loved by all his family and friends. Ned was so much more then his addiction. He will be forever missed and loved. This disease took him away from a family that will be forever heartbroken without him here.

Salvatore Marchese

Sal, a Son, Brother and and most importantly, a Father...

Sal was born on April 11, 1984, two months premature. As my sister-in-law stated after his passing ""he came into this world early and left early."" Sal was an absolute beautiful child with a heart of gold. Sal was truly an old soul."" If you met Sal once, you were his friend forever.

Jeffrey Giovinco

Jeffrey- my cousin but more like my brother- I miss His infectious laugh, that mischievous grin and how big his heart was, how much he loved his mom and me and his family. He is so missed. Hope he is dancing in the sky.

Douglas Sanders

Doug was such a special person - so talented and worldly. He was very much loved by his entire family.

Andrew Joseph Roth

"Andrew Joseph Roth

Son, Brother, Uncle, Personality bigger than Broad Street, forever missed, always remembered"

Donte M. Douglas

This handsome young man is my son Donte M. Douglas he will forever be 33 yrs young. Donte was such a vibrant person who loved to make people laugh and he was a real jockster.

Anthony Martinez

Anthony was a lover of nature, a fantastic chef and a natural-born comedian. Our world has not been the same without him.

Dawn Enright

My beautiful mom was found unresponsive on 8/22/21 and for two days, I sat by her bedside and stared the disease of addiction in the face. After a lifelong substance abuse battle, I chose to remove my mom from life support at the age of 54.

In honor of her memory, I will continue on the path of recovery myself and spread awareness about the disease of addiction.

Jason Paul Geist

Loving son, big brother, caring person who would help anyone at anytime. We all carry his shining light within our hearts always. Missed every minute of every day. Never forgotten and forever loved. Lisa Geist

Samantha Pierce

John "Hoody" Moore

My son had just turned 28 on April 6th. He took 2 fake Percocet and never woke up. His 2 year old daughter and fiancé were in bed sleeping. His cause of death was an accidental fentanyl overdose.

Suzanne Malloy Hopkins

Suzy lost her battle to addiction on March 5th,2007.

She is missed everyday by her family and friends, may she rest in peace .

Jason Clair

We all love you you can finally rest

Donna Hopkins

Donna was a mother , grandmother, daughter who left this earth way to soon we love and miss

Anthony Mesoraca

My beautiful boy..ForEver28 and forever loved and missed.

Brett Michael Losey

When I think of sunrises and sunsets, I think of Brett. He is best described as "the life of the party" and "funniest guy in the room." Brett is loved dearly and missed by many. Everyday and forevermore. <3, CC

Vinnie Robert Carter Jr.

Vincent had a wonderful life that was taken way too soon. He was such a happy, funny, care-free son, brother, friend, cousin, and teammate. He brought so much joy to all of us who miss him everyday. We will never forget your smile and laugh. Vinnie you are missed everyday more than you'll ever know.

With love, Vinnie and Nicole

Dennis K. McGettigan Jr.

Dj- you are missed every day. We love and honor you forever! Xoxo

Mom

Douglas Jay Maestre

Doug had a huge heart and was very caring towards others. He would always lend a helpful hand whenever he could to help others. He literally took his shirt off his back and shoes off his feet for a homeless man one day. That is how Doug was towards others and he missed by many. Amani his daughter adored her father and she misses him more then anything. Amani knows her Daddy is her guardian angel now and watches over her everyday. Doug, I hope you're up in heaven playing the guitar and watching over everyone. You're missed by many and please keep watching over Amani. 💜Love, Casi

John Christopher Been

John was an amazing human he was a brother a father and uncle and fought a long hard battle with his demons.

John your still loved and I know your very proud of your children.

Love aunt Jeannine

Allen W Szyszko

This is my beautiful son, Allen W Szyszko, who is missed every day but alive in the hearts of those he touched. Elizabeth Thomas

Scott Healy

Scott was the kindest and gentlest soul

Falon Roeschke

Falon loved vanilla pudding. She called everyone sweetie.

Sue Corrigan

Sue was the brightest light. She fiercely loved people who use drugs and advocated for them everyday

Fatimah Hatton

David Joseph Goldberg

My beautiful 23 year old son David Goldberg lost his life to substance use disorder. He was an honor student and graduate of Penn State University. He aspired to work in healthcare as a PA. He is missed and loved dearly.

Ashley S White

As a Christian, there is a scripture in the bible that says be not forgetful to entertain strangers: for thereby some have entertained angels unawares. It means to be mindful of people because you may not know they're angels and are here for a little while.

Creigh Horvath

Thomas Joseph Groves

Thomas Groves was passionate about everything he set his mind to. He was a talented chef and a great dad to his pups Roxy and Blue. The beach was his happy place. Thomas always made it his mission to entertain those around him and is known to be a goofball among his family and friends. He is missed each and every day.

Sean Patrick Joseph

Sean died of an overdose in May 2015. He was a funny, kind hearted man who would help anyone in need. He ismissed tremendously by his family. He's always in our hearts and thoughts. We love you Seanie bear.

Kristi Lynn Graf

Kristi Lynn Graf Was 25 years old. She was a so bubbly and fun. She was passionate about music and was a beautiful singer. She loved her family and friends deeply. She always made an effort to befriend everyone. Everyone who knew her was changed for the better.

My sister, Kristi Graf, was genuine, unique and the funniest person I've ever known. Our time was cut too short but we were all blessed to have known her.

Louie Merenda

Nicholas A. Stolinski

My uncle Nick was the best uncle in the world. He was doing great for three years. He relapsed one time, and it took his life. I never imagined that I'd have to be writing this right now!! He is loved and missed dearly!! He rode up to heaven on his Harley Davidson!! I miss him dearly!! I love you Uncle Nick<3

Shana Malamphy

Shana was the sweetest and kindest soul we have ever met. A loving mother, daughter, friend, and sister. We miss her every day .

Gabrielle Dawn Sweder

Gabrielle lived her hell on earth and earned her way to Heaven. She was a beautiful soul who was unable to fight the demons that consumed her.

Woody Miles

Woody was the best human being you could ever have in your life. We shared 25 plus years of friendship. He had a huge heart and loved so many. He touched so many people and I miss him everyday.

Bryan Davis

Bryan Davis, When you were little and bigger, I always signed my greeting cards to you 'Love Always and Forever XX00'. Since you've been gone the sentiment hasn't changed. Love Always and Forever, Mom. XX00

Matthew David Foley

Matthew was a smart, funny, kind and gentle person who was dearly loved and is greatly missed by his father and I, his brother, sister-in-law, niece, many aunts, uncles, cousins and friends

Daniel Meehan

Danny, you were loved and you are missed so very much XO

Timothy Patrick Young

My son, Tim, loved his daughter more than anything. She was 3 when her father died. Tim worked hard at his job, and the day after he died he was to be recognized for top sales performer of the previous year. Tim was an excellent poker player, and loved to bluff. Sadly in the end, Tim was bluffed by drug dealers who sold him fake pills pressed with fentanyl.

Steven Powers

Steven we love and miss you everyday. Wish you didn't have to leave us so soon. Love Mom & Peggy

Kimera Robinson

Here is my loving daughter, Kimera. She was a mother, sister, daughter and friend to all. She was very compassionate and nurturing; a mini-me, and my absolute best friend. She would give anyone the shirt off of her back. She loved to laugh and to make others laugh. She loved family, and her three children Kyemere, Kimiya, and Kyeyere. LLM (Long Live Mera)

<3</3<3<3 Love, Mommy

Feda Kuran

Feda was 45 years old and had just had her first grandchild. She leaves behind 4 kids who love and miss her terribly.

Gabriel Issac Rissman

My nephew Gabriel was 21 years old and he passed away from drugs and alcohol. He never wanted to die he just wanted to dull the pain inside of him. He cared about others and was loved so much by his sisters and family. He tried really hard to beat this.

Kelly Ann Cunningham

Jace 'Korynn' Berry

Jace was my oldest of 4. He was the most beautiful, caring, loving and compassionate human our family has ever known. He had the silliest sense of humor and wasn't shy about his immaturity lol. He was in the midst of his gender transition and it was an honor to witness every experience as his mother. He made such a positive impact on so many peoples lives within his 25 years on this earth. I imagine he's doing the same in Spirit. To say I love and miss him terribly is an understatement. Xoxo 💛

Eric Daniel Poore

How do I describe my precious grandson...Eric had a ready smile, an infectious laugh, and an upbeat personality. He viewed the world without judgment and with a unique ability to put a positive spin on almost anything. No matter what was going on in his life, his outlook was always, 'It's gonna be okay.'

Cory D Martin

My son Cory D Martin was oneof the kindest caring loving souls o have known. The pain he felt for being an addict and shame he felt broke Mt heart . We should be helping people not shaming them educate yourselves and others so maybe empathy rather then shame is how we can turn this around . I know your watching us Cory I will see you some day son.

Julian Newman

Julian Newman. You are Free. We Love You

Frank William Jones

My beautiful son, Frankie was 21 years old when he overdosed from bad heroin. He did not want to die, he had been sober for almost a year.

Julia DeFalco

Kevin Berry

Dillen Linsenbach

Beloved son and brother. Missed behind words. Love mom and Leighton

Stefanie Andrea Boyle

My beautiful Stefanie, who wanted to help everyone and sadly, no one could help you. I miss you every day you are not here but your memories live on in my heart. I hope I gave you some happy times while you were here. Love, MOM XOXO

Dennis T. Boyle

My Denny, who before drugs was honest, caring, giving, and so smart. Drugs just robbed him of everything and I was not able to stop it and neither was he. What a horrible disease. I miss my one and only son. I miss watching football, I miss our Sunday dinners , the phone calls, talking politics and most of all the hugs. God be with you, Love MOM XOXO

Anthony Fiore

Anthony Fiore was a kind and loving son, brother, grandson, nephew, cousin, and friend. He was so much more than his addiction.

Nicole Quinn

🎀 Colee 🎀

There is no one on this earth that could ever replace you.... You were one of a kind , and you were mine.... I will love & miss you Colee as long as I live...

Aml Aml

Mommy

Joshua L Lipstein

Josh was and still is loved by so many family, friends, and his Navy Battle Buddies. He made a positive impact on all the lives he touched in the 23 years he was on this earth. He is loved and missed daily by each of us. I feel him in my heart and soul daily. So Much Love, Dad

Jacob A Hicks & Randall H Hicks

Jacob Allan Hicks and Randall H Hicks we're brothers Jacob was older then randy by 3 years. They did everything together growing up and were very close. Both were funny, caring and loved by so many. They are truly missed each and every day. One December evening they decided to share a bag of Heroin that was given to them for free and it cost them their lives. We love and miss them very much. Love your family and friends.

Jared S Mealy

Colin Culberson

Tyler Bainbridge

In sweet memory of my big brother, Tyler Bainbridge. He was so much more than his illness, and his legacy inspires me every single day. We will never stop fighting to end the stigma.

Tara Dooley

Our mom was funny, intelligent, beautiful, caring, and loved deeply. She was born and raised in Philly, pursued her passion through a career in cosmetology. She was loved by many.

Jessica Vanderslice

My beautiful daughter Her life mattered. Forever 31 💜Jessica Lee💜 Miss you terribly Love you forever, Mom

Victoria Lynn Schieber Exner

Victoria Lynn Schieber Exner 💜 my daughter was kind, loving & giving.

Victoria Lynn is missed beyond words. She will always be my Bunner doo. Until we meet again R.I.P. my darling

🙏🕊️🌸🌹

I love you, Mom 💐

Chuck (Chally Wops) DiTullio

Chuck loved his daughter more than anything in the world. He was funny and always had us laughing, he wrote and rapped music and loved sports, most of all basketball. His life was stolen by the pharmaceutical companies who knew they were prescribing drugs that were highly addictive. They are murderers and should pay for what they did and continue to do.

We love you Chuck and you are deeply missed. We will always be grateful for the time we had you here with us, though it was too short. Love forever and always, Mom

Andrew T. Hightower

John "Jack" Francis Bolger III

Christopher Curtis Deckman

Everybody's Best Friend Unconditionally

Chris' Ma

John Daley

A smile that's worth the world, you were and are so loved, and missed by so many. All my Love, your little sis.

Carlton Michael Woodlin Jr

Description goes hereBeloved Son, Brother, Grandson and nephew who is dearly missed by his family

Michael Orlando jr

Michael Orlando jr.we love and miss you. ❤️

Sydney Charles Robinson

Elida Santiago

Forever in my heart, I love you.

Your sister, Denise

Steve Free

Steve was a son worth having. Sensitive, caring, hardworking, loyal, funny, and dependable; he was the kind of person who would stop on a rainy night to help a stranger whose car had broken down on the side of a road. Missing his laughter, hugs, funny and adventurous stories and dedication to family. We, his mom, dad, brothers, sister, friends and his little 7 year old boy remember you and miss you every single day, Steve. Your absence leaves a huge hole in our hearts. Looking forward to our great reunion in heaven. Your loving family. xoxo

Valerie Gervasi

Our sweet Valerie - amazing artist & singer. World traveler with an adventurous, free spirit and a caring heart that made the world a happier place. Very deeply loved and missed, always.

Love Mommy, Vince and Devin

Ronald MacMurray

Description goes hereRonald MacMurray was an amazing son brother, uncle an friend he is missed by many. Now Forever Always.

Ronny was an amazing Son brother uncle friend. Big smile that would light up the room. We all miss you so much. Love always an forever. Now Forever Always.

Eddie Martin

Eddie was an awesome kid the best nephew so talented omg funny always making everyone laugh he lit the room up. Ronny was an amazing Son brother uncle friend. Big smile that would light up the room. We all miss you so much. Love always an forever. Now Forever Always.

Daniel Herbst

Daniel was a bright Man with a big heart Daniel is missed deeply. Now Forever Always.

Tyrique Fleming

Tyrique always had the funniest stories! He would laugh the entire time while telling a story ! He loved his family and we love him more!!

Zachary Ondo

My son taken before his time, Fentanyl OD

Amazing young man who was loved by so many

Zac, I love you ❤️ Mom

Elizabeth "Beth" Marino

Butch Rosemiller Jr.

My beloved brother Butch, I love and miss you everyday of my life. I wish I could change all this . I know your in a better place with mom and dad. I love you Always You sister Renee

Jeremiah Marrow

My best friend my go to the one that would be in my corner through anything and tough it out with me. You always made me feel so much better so loving and caring made this world better everyday. Your missed by everyone down here. One thing I'll miss the most those big warm hugs. With much love, Ameerah.

Carly Ann Leimbach

My daughter Carly Ann Leimbach was only 19 years old. Almost 20, a few days shy of her 20th Birthday for which she was so excited to turn 20z NEVER HAPPENED. She went to help someone, never came home again. That person still living.

Kevin M McGinty

Kevin, you wild genius, I will

miss you everyday for the rest of my

lifestyle.

Xo, Dr AngelFace

James Joseph Henwood jr.

Jake Jessar

My son, Jake Jessar lives in the hearts of family and friends. He was a hard working, fun loving , enthusiastic person, a great son and a loyal friend. He is missed every hour of every day. Love always and forever, mom

Anthony Estrella

My brother Anthony was more than his addiction. He was a brother, a son, a father, a friend, he loved the outdoors and working with his hands, he loved winter sports, he loved holidays w family. He tried very hard to fight his addiction but unfortunately it overtook him. He will be forever in our hearts. We miss and love you Tony. Love, Susan

John Michael Tardino

John Michael Tardino (Dino), "Beyond the Sunset, there awaits a new Dawn.”

Liza M. Dorfman

This is my amazing daughter's Liza Dorfman. She loved exploring and living in Philadelphia. Every day was an adventure with Liza. Science, baking, art, gardening, hiking, and traveling the world were only a few of the talents she enjoyed and shared. So beautiful, brilliant and brave!

Forever loved and missed by all,

Especially mom, Stacey Dorfman

Ruby Rawls

Ruby Rawls was the joy of our family. She had the biggest heart and the most loving spirit you could imagine.

Riley M. Zelienka

Matthew Ryan

Matthew sadly missed by his family daughter and mother

Briana Desalis

Emmett O'Doherty

Teddy Leslie

Teddy was full of life before he passed away. He built a life of love, friendships and family. His humor is missed every single day. For those people who knew Teddy for who he really was, they would say he was kind, he showed up for people, wanted others to succeed with him. His life is more than just a number. His life mattered. We remember him always. We love you Teddy.

Riley M. Zelienka

Riley Zelienka original, imperfect, and always grateful for her education, artistic ability, relationships, determination and, most of all, family.

She cherished the things in life that were important to her: spending time with her son Jesse and with friends she could always count on, practicing yoga, keeping a list of goals and other things she had decided to accomplish.

For the short time she was here, Riley wrote her own story. She will be dearly missed.

Patrick Rathgeb

Patrick was full of love and had a smile that could light the room. He was loved by all. Keep watching over us and sending signs. We love you Always.

Riana Mae Perry

A beloved sister, who's dream was to become a doctor. The first doctor in the Perry family.

Timothy Chase Bianco

8/1/1988 - 5/5/2021

Tim was a kind, funny, inquisitive and loving son, brother, friend, nephew, cousin, and grandson.

Kyle James Lundberg

We love and miss you Kyle James Lundberg . You will forever live in our hearts . Forever 22 Murdered by Fentanyl Poisoning. I will hug you again someday Mom 💔

Brittney Romano

Dominic D'Angelo

Till we meet again !

Thomas Gray Reynolds

Tom was a wonderful boy who brought us a lot of joy. We're sad to have lost him after just 26 years. -Molly, Ann & Bob Reynolds

Riley Zelienka

Paul Deer

Karen Meehan

Tiffany Lee Bashwinger

Tiffany Lee Bashwinger will be missed

Timmy Pudgeon

Benjamin Pavoni

Skylur Derk

Gary King

Mark Alexander Harwanko

Alex was my loving partner and best friend. He was the life of the party and knew how to make anyone laugh. He is loved and missed by so many.

Steven A. Boothe

Steven was a student at Usciences, he was a kind soul and friend to all. He is dearly missed by all who knew and loved him.

Tyler James Taggart

My beautiful son Tyler J Taggart. There is not a day that passes we do not feel your absence from our lives. Your intoxicating smile, laughter and kind spirit stolen by addiction. You fought hard to recover and that I will always be thankful for. Your 18 months of sobriety brought peace love and hope for the future. It brought a second grandchild to live and remember you by as he has so many of your amazing qualities and like your kind heart, charm and beautiful face. We are so grateful for your children as they bring us comfort in our grief. Part of you lives on in them.

Michael Richardson

This is my fiancé, Michael Richardson. He was a father, brother, son, and spouse. He is missed every day by his family. We love you.

Cherylann Clark

Shea Carmen Swan

Shea, "if noone told you they love you today, I love you... You are loved! Grateful for all the lives you impacted. Forever in our hearts and soul! XOXO Mom

Dan Savage

I will always mourn as you never knew the impact you had on the world, it takes one time one night one day, I pray we meet again always love to you Dan.

With forever love b

Justin Jay Wilson

This is Justin, a wonderful father , son, grandson, we love youvmiss you ! Alec and Mom

Skylar Marie Caldwell

This is my beautiful daughter who I miss more and more everyday that passes

Natalie

Donald R Connor lV

My son Donald R Connor lV didn't deserve to die of fentanyl poisoning ! He had so much life ahead of him. He was only 19, Donnie was smart, funny, incredibly handsome, and he loved his family. My Donnie will be missed and remembered forever.

I miss and love you so much Donnie

Love Momny

Matthew Charles Koenig
